title: Deep Dive - MarkLogic Performance Tuning Tips and Techniques
abstract: When your awesome application is about to be deployed, sizing becomes an important topic. This talk will go over the current rules of thumb for sizing, and how they should be changed for MarkLogic 5.0. Weâ€™ll also discuss the impact of virtualization technologies, such as SAN and NAS.

surveys.comments: Excellent. Need more presentations like this.
Good "ought experiment" walking through a specific practical example.
Added another layer to my understanding.  Thank you.  Interested in a standardized procedure to identify performance issues / bottlenecks as they are happening.

It was clear from the standing room only crowd that this was a critical subject for lots of people, and the information was jam-packed with usefulness and presented with conciseness and competence.  Please put this session in a bigger room (like the amphitheater) next year; I actually had to walk out because I was having trouble breathing in the ill-ventilated, CO2-rich atmosphere in there.

Best class of the conference.  Finally someone that addresses system information.   Please PLEASE, have more of these in future user conferences.  Also, please have some examples of inverted configs, I.e. 6-10 E nodes and 2 D nodes
Best technical session I've been to. More like this next year please!
